purpose.summary: This DBD source file defines the IMS database PADFLDBD as a GSAM database with BSAM access method and no password protection. It specifies Dataset Group 1 (DSG001) with input dataset DD1=PADFILIP and output dataset DD2=PADFILOP, both using fixed-length records of 200 bytes (RECFM=F). The definition was prepared for DBDGEN processing on IMS version 15.1.

inputs.name: PADFILIP
inputs.description: Input dataset (DD1) associated with Dataset Group 1 of the PADFLDBD GSAM database, fixed 200-byte records

outputs.name: PADFILOP
outputs.description: Output dataset (DD2) associated with Dataset Group 1 of the PADFLDBD GSAM database, fixed 200-byte records

open_questions.question: Specific business purpose of the PADFLDBD database
open_questions.context: DBD source defines structure but not application-level usage
open_questions.suggestion: Review IMS application programs or PCBs that reference this DBD
